activities.loc: Courtroom D, Fourth Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

No possession of weapons. Curfew from 7 PM to 7 AM. No contact with co-defendant Daimon Smith. No contact with victim C.T.C. or their residence or any named witnesses in this case. Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint with GPS monitoring. Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.

3:21 PM Prosecuting attorney Kyle Edward Johnson and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Armon Devon Mims appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for Armon Devon Mims. Defendant address verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $20,000 with conditions. No possession of weapons. Curfew from 7 PM to 7 AM. No contact with co-defendant Daimon Smith. No contact with victim C.T.C. or their residence or any named witnesses in this case. Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint with GPS monitoring. Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
